text: Pappukutty Bhagavathar (; 29 March 1913 â€“ 22 June 2020) was an Indian singer and actor. His works were in Malayalam cinema. He was born in Kochi, India. His best known roles were in Sthreehridayam, Sree Guruvayoorappan and in Kattukurangu. Bhagavathar died of heart failure in New Delhi on 22 June 2020, aged 107.Veteran Kerala singer and actor Pappukutty Bhagavathar dies at 107 ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian centenarians Category:Indian singers Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors
title: Pappukutty Bhagavathar
